description: The AutoWeb module automates web interactions using Playwright, supporting natural mouse movements, form submissions, screenshot capture, and network request interception.

functions.automate_web: Automates a sequence of web interactions based on a list of actions (navigate, click, type, wait) with timeout support.
functions.auto_grok: Automates interactions on a Grok-like interface, including feature toggles, prompt input, and validated attachments.
functions.capture_screenshot: Captures a screenshot of a webpage and saves it to a specified file.
functions.intercept_network: Intercepts and logs network requests made by a webpage during navigation.
